summary: Adds a storage chest in Riverwood either at Gerdurs or Alvors house.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a player owned chest in either Gerdurs or Alvors house so you have somewhere to store items before buying your first house.

It will only be at the family that welcomed you and it will only appear after they have welcomed you.
For the chest in Alvors house to appear you have to leave the house once after the talk.

-----------------------
[b]Installation[/b]

Drop the folder and files into the Data folder: [i]...\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data[/i]


-----------------------
[b]Uninstall[/b]

Remember that any items stored in these chests when uninstalling will be lost.

Remove the files:
[i]RiverwoodStorage.esp
Scripts\\RiverwoodStorage.pex
Scripts\\Source\\RiverwoodStorage.psc[/i]
author: freche
